build.doc_string: Executes the provided build system or prompt for selection (select: true) and choose a default. build_system should be a resource path to a build system file or the name of a project-specific build system

args.name: select
args.doc_string: Whether to prompt for selecting a build system.

args.name: build_system
args.doc_string: A resource path to a .sublime-build file.

args.name: variant
args.doc_string: The name of the variant present in the build system as specified by the 'name' key.
